items.content_html: This is a lightweight and interactive pixel drawing board build with Vite (React). The app allows users to create pixel art by clicking/dragging across a customizable grid. It's designed for simplicity, speed, and ease of use ‚Äî perfect for quick sketches or experimenting with pixel designs.
